mapper.insert:
insert into codeTracker.meta_method ( uuid, fullname, signature, class_name, file_name, file_path, package_name, module_name, class_uuid, package_uuid, start_commit, start_commit_date, end_commit, end_commit_date, repo_uuid, branch, content, version ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.fullname}, #{item.signature}, #{item.parent.className}, #{item.parent.fileName}, #{item.parent.filePath}, #{item.parent.packageName}, #{item.parent.moduleName}, #{item.parent.uuid}, #{item.parent.packageUuid}, #{item.startCommit}, #{item.startCommitDate}, #{item.endCommit}, #{item.endCommitDate}, #{item.repoUuid}, #{item.branch}, #{item.content}, #{item.trackerInfo.version} )

insert into codeTracker.raw_method ( uuid, fullname, signature, class_uuid, method_uuid, version, change_relation, commitid, committer, commit_date, commit_message, parent_commit, content, method_begin, method_end, diff, repo_uuid, branch ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.fullname}, #{item.signature}, #{item.parent.uuid}, #{item.trackerInfo.rootUUID}, #{item.trackerInfo.version}, #{item.trackerInfo.changeRelation}, #{item.commit}, #{item.committer}, #{item.commitDate}, #{item.commitMessage}, #{item.parentCommit}, #{item.content}, #{item.begin}, #{item.end}, #{item.diff,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=cn.edu.fudan.codetracker.handler.JsonTypeHandler}, #{item.repoUuid}, #{item.branch} )
mapper.select: select version,uuid from codeTracker.meta_method where uuid = (select method_uuid from codeTracker.raw_method where signature = #{signature} and method_uuid in (select uuid from codeTracker.meta_method where file_path = #{filePath} and class_name = #{className} and meta_method.repo_uuid = #{repoUuid} and meta_method.branch = #{branch}) limit 1) order by version desc limit 1
